Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: தேறற்க யாரையும் தேராது தேர்ந்தபின் தேறுக தேறும் பொருள்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Trust no man whom you have not fully tried; When tested, in his prudence proved confide.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A split composition. On the left, a king is cautiously observing a potential minister through a spyglass, who is performing a difficult task. This represents the 'testing' phase ('தேராது').
Layered_Composition.Midground: On the right, the same king, now assured, is confidently handing over the royal seal to the same minister, who has passed the test. This represents the 'trusting' phase ('தேர்ந்தபின் தேறுக').
Layered_Composition.Background: A well-run kingdom, which is the result of this two-step process of careful testing followed by confident delegation.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The two-part rule of trust: do not trust without thorough investigation, but after investigation proves them worthy, trust them completely in matters they are proven in.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The spyglass symbolizes the investigation phase. The handing over of the royal seal symbolizes complete trust and delegation of authority.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Shifting from cautious scrutiny to confident trust. Wise, methodical, secure.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The left 'testing' side has a neutral, analytical light. The right 'trusting' side is bathed in a warm, confident, golden light.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A balanced, diptych-style shot that clearly separates and contrasts the two stages of the process.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with fine details on the expressions of caution and confidence.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Split lighting to match the mood of each panel.

Negative_Prompt: king trusting blindly, king doubting after testing, text artifacts, cartoonish figures, blurry.
